Attributes.description: Best practices of the contemporary busines of music, focussing on understanding present market conditions, and on targeting specific opportunities through grant-writing, resumés, press kits, publicity, recordings, and marketing. Restricted to fourth-year B.Mus. students.
Attributes.date_buildings: Term: 2, Days: Mon Wed, Start Time: 9:30, End Time: 11:00, Building: Music, Room: 113
